articles.description: Bollywood patriotic songs to evoke desh bhakti in you...
articles.content: This track from the movie Border is a musical feast! It takes you on a journey to the Front Line, where a soldier reads letters sent from lovers, mothers, and childhood friends, asking for his return.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: PM Modi applauds Ricky Kej's grand National Anthem rendition with historic British orchestra - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi commended Grammy winner Ricky Kej's rendition of the national anthem, "Jana Gana Mana," performed by a record-breaking 100-piece British orchestra from the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra (RPO) at London's Abbey Road Studios.
